data: `minecraft:behavior.trade_interest` allows an entity to focus on a player that will initiate a trade.

data.Name: carried_item_switch_time
data.Description: The max time in seconds that the trader will hold an item before attempting to switch for a different item that takes the same trade

data.Name: cooldown
data.Description: The time in seconds before the trader can use this goal again

data.Name: interest_time
data.Description: The max time in seconds that the trader will be interested with showing its trade items

data.Name: remove_item_time
data.Description: The max time in seconds that the trader will wait when you no longer have items to trade

data.Name: within_radius
data.Description: Distance in blocks this mob can be interested by a player holding an item they like
